lore: These creatures do not seem to communicate verbally, but a young apprentice Mage versed in multiple languages discovered during one of his adventures that they communicate through laughter.\n\nManiac Chiefs wear the straps of the strongest Maniacs they kill. Almost all tribes have multiple Leaders, who are usually the most experienced Maniacs. However, they often disagree and end up killing each other.
menagerieDialog: (It laughs at a far higher pitch than you would have thought possible. This, in turn, makes you laugh, which makes it laugh even harder. The two of you are stuck in an endless loop of compounding giggles.)
(It's not wearing any pants, so there's that.)
(Unfortunately, this creature is dancing. You're almost positive that it's moving in such a way to cause its rolls to jiggle a little extra.)
(It's always threatening to kill itself. Isn't that what Maniacs are made for, anyway?)
name: Maniac Chief
